name: Les Feuilles Mortes
description:
Inspired by the jazz standard Autumn Leaves, Les Feuilles Mortes is a game for 2 players with a deck of cards. You will follow two characters in a relationship, viewing moments in time as they try to navigate their lives with one another. Will they drift apart? Or will they walk together, despite all odds?

Sometimes, it's all about the things you don't say.
